hint: Focus on pushing filters early into CTEs, eliminating correlated subqueries, and converting implicit joins to explicit joins for better planning.
Isolate the date_dim subquery into a CTE, then materialize pre-filtered dimension tables (customer, item) before joining with fact tables.
Compute all sales channels in a single CTE using UNION ALL to avoid repeated scans, then aggregate once. Materialize filtered dimensions separately.
Transform the final self-join with multiple BETWEEN conditions into an INTERSECT-based approach using HAVING clauses on a unified CTE.
